TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, however when you ride a boat over, there is an earthquake sucking you to the core of the earth.

I wish I had a protective shield

Granted; its your skin; it only protects you from microscopic threats

I wish for drinking to be legal

granted you can only drink poison.

I wish to be rich

Granted, but someone steals it shortly after.

I wish the internet was free of viruses, trolls, and offensive insults towards innocent people.

Edited December 20, 2013 by quasarrgames

granted. You are now rich in Chlorine trifluoride, which... Well... http://pipeline.corante.com/archives/2008/02/26/sand_wont_save_you_this_time.php

Yeah...

I wish for a wish.

Edit: Dang it, ninja'd.

Okay, the internet is now gone.

I still wish for a wish.

Granted. The wish was to explode very violently and painfully. This wish was not corrupted.

I wish to explode very violently and painfully

granted, it falls on your head and kills you on impact.

i wish i was athletic.

Granted. But we sort of lost you in the Canadian vending machine warehouse. So we just blew one of them up at random.

I wish to be a zombie.

Granted, but you are killed by Alice.

I wish that anything i said would happen instantaneously, and could never harm me.

Edited November 17, 2013 by quasarrgames

wish granted but the handsomely charming, awesome, stylish, intelligent, athletic, heroic protagonist (me) kills you with a spoon.

i wish for a zombie apocalypse.

Granted. A man then runs up to you and shoots

(Didn't wish for the man to shoot, therefore you are killed)

I wish for me to not take things to literally

Granted, you now live in the gutter. Literally.

I wish for wet noodles and sea monsters!

granted, but a sea monster releases a gas onto the shore that continues on and eventually makes the entire world air supply smell like bad breath.

i wish i was a super hero.

Granted, but it's all a big conspiracy and you don't actually get any powers.

I wish I was alive.

Granted, but instantly got mistaken for a dead body and was buried alive.

I wish.

Granted, but.

I wish for misty mountains cold...

*Starts singing it in head* "Far over, the misty mountains cold, to dungeons deep, and caverns old." Oh, right, wish. Granted. You now own the misty mountains cold. It's about... Let's see... http://what-if.xkcd.com/57/ (second to last one, the first in space) Aimed to hit your house.

I wish for a chain-chomp to love me.

Granted, I love you too much, so it eat you.

I wish to have some soup

Granted, but you did not specify the size. Enjoy your 1mL beaker of soup. It might be poisoned, too; we're not sure.

I wish for some chocolate.

wish granted, your dog eats it.

i wish to rule the world

Joke's on you; I don't have a dog! xD

Granted, but you are assassinated within the first three seconds of your reign.

I wish for a chat with death.

Damn ninjas.

Death isn't real. Therefore the wish in question cannot happen

I wish for my nightmares to be reality

Granted... except they're a thousand times more terrifying and extensive than they were in your head.

I wish to be Death himself.

Granted, but death has no philosophy, so you must surrender your privilege to be a philosophical moderator.

therefore you have no meaning.

I wish I had a death book.

Granted, but it only kills you.

I wish I was a poet.
